name: Nightlight (FrightClub)
description:
Flash Warning: This game contains flashing lights 

Home is different at night. When many go to sleep, many others awake and reap. With a pareidolia, or a child’s mind, you can hear and see them. Don’t bother telling your parents, they won’t listen - very few do. Tell a friend, tell a bear. They’ll give you an ear, tell you there is nothing to fear. In turn, there will be less tears, and the world will become clearer. 

At night, you are not alone. Those noises you hear belong to the beings who appear. It’s easy to be scared, but it’s the light and your courage that they fear. And, your bears are out there in despair, without the one who cares. You must have courage and use your lantern to find all of them - be strong against the beings who disappear.

Controls: WASD

Known visual bugs on wide screen monitors
